results.title: Folate- and chitosan-functionalized lipid nanoparticles for co-delivery of pioglitazone and simvastatin to enhance hepatic cancer therapy: effects on IL-1beta, IL-6, BCL2/BAX gene expression, and GPX4, COX-2, and MMP-9 activities.
results.text_hl: This study evaluated a nanotechnology-based co-delivery approach to improve their therapeutic efficacy against chemoresistant @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@. METHODS AND RESULTS: @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@ nanoparticles (LNPs) encapsulating @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@PIO@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@STAT@@@ (PSLNPs) were fabricated and functionalized with @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ (CPSLNPs) or @CHEMICAL_Folic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005492 @@@folate@@@-conjugated @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ (FCPSLNPs).
